con:request.name: Create Mediation_CreateEdr script
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r
   <soapenv:Header/>\r
   <soapenv:Body>\r
      <ws:createOrUpdate>\r
         <createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.Mediation_${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_CreateEdr" description="Mediation Create Edr">\r
            <type>JAVA</type>\r
            <script><![CDATA[package org.meveo.service.script;

import java.math.RoundingMode;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.admin.parse.csv.CDR;
import org.meveo.model.BaseEntity;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.meveo.model.crm.Provider;
import org.meveo.model.mediation.Access;
import org.meveo.model.rating.EDR;
import org.meveo.model.rating.EDRStatusEnum;
import org.meveo.service.billing.impl.EdrService;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

public class Mediation_${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_CreateEdr extends org.meveo.service.script.Script {

	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(Mediation_${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_CreateEdr.class);

	@Override
	public void execute(Map<String, Object> initContext) throws BusinessException {
		log.debug("Execute...");
		CDR cdr = (CDR) initContext.get("cdr");
		String originBatch = (String) initContext.get("originBatch");
		String originRecord = (String) initContext.get("originRecord");

		List<Access> accesses = (List<Access>) initContext.get("accesses");

		EdrService edrService = (EdrService) getServiceInterface("EdrService");

		for (Access accessPoint : accesses) {
			if ((accessPoint.getStartDate() == null || accessPoint.getStartDate().getTime() <= cdr.getTimestamp().getTime()) && (accessPoint.getEndDate() == null || accessPoint.getEndDate().getTime() > cdr.getTimestamp().getTime())) {

				EDR edr = new EDR();
				edr.setCreated(new Date());
				edr.setEventDate(cdr.getTimestamp());
				edr.setOriginBatch(originBatch);
				edr.setOriginRecord(originRecord);
				edr.setParameter1(cdr.getParam1());
				edr.setParameter2(cdr.getParam2());
				edr.setParameter3(cdr.getParam3());
				edr.setParameter4(cdr.getParam4());
				edr.setParameter5(cdr.getParam5());
				edr.setParameter6(cdr.getParam6());
				edr.setParameter7(cdr.getParam7());
				edr.setParameter8(cdr.getParam8());
				edr.setParameter9(cdr.getParam9());
				edr.setDateParam1(cdr.getDateParam1());
				edr.setDateParam2(cdr.getDateParam2());
				edr.setDateParam3(cdr.getDateParam3());
				edr.setDateParam4(cdr.getDateParam4());
				edr.setDateParam5(cdr.getDateParam5());
				edr.setDecimalParam1(cdr.getDecimalParam1() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam1().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setDecimalParam2(cdr.getDecimalParam2() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam2().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setDecimalParam3(cdr.getDecimalParam3() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam3().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setDecimalParam4(cdr.getDecimalParam4() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam4().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setDecimalParam5(cdr.getDecimalParam5() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam5().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setAccessCode(accessPoint.getAccessUserId());
				edr.setQuantity(cdr.getQuantity());
				edr.setStatus(EDRStatusEnum.OPEN);
				edr.setSubscription(accessPoint.getSubscription());
				edrService.create(edr);
			}
			log.info("Execute update entity OK");
		}
	}

}]]></script>\r
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>\r
      </ws:createOrUpdate>\r
   </soapenv:Body>\r
</soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create Mediation_DuplicatedCheck script
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r
   <soapenv:Header/>\r
   <soapenv:Body>\r
      <ws:createOrUpdate>\r
         <createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.Mediation_${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_DuplicatedCheck" description="Mediation DuplicatedCheck">\r
            <type>JAVA</type>\r
            <script>package org.meveo.service.script;

import java.nio.charset.Charset;
import java.security.MessageDigest;
import java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException;
import java.util.Map;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.model.crm.Provider;
import org.meveo.service.billing.impl.EdrService;
import org.meveo.service.script.Script;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

public class Mediation_${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_DuplicatedCheck extends Script {

	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(Mediation_${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_DuplicatedCheck.class);
	static MessageDigest messageDigest = null;
	static {
		try {
			messageDigest = MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5");
		} catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException e) {

		}
	}
	EdrService edrService = (EdrService) getServiceInterface("EdrService");

	@Override
	public void execute(Map<String, Object> initContext) throws BusinessException {
		log.info("Execute...");
		String originBatch = (String) initContext.get("originBatch");
		String originRecord = getOriginRecord(initContext.get("record"));
		initContext.put("originRecord", originRecord);
		boolean result = edrService.isDuplicateFound(originBatch, originRecord);
		initContext.put("duplicateFound", Boolean.valueOf(result));
		log.info("Execute result:"+result);
	}

	public String getOriginRecord(Object object) {
		String result = object.toString();
        if (messageDigest != null) {
			synchronized (messageDigest) {
					messageDigest.reset();
					messageDigest.update(result.getBytes(Charset.forName("UTF8")));
					final byte[] resultByte = messageDigest.digest();
					StringBuffer sb = new StringBuffer();
					for (int i = 0; i < resultByte.length; ++i) {
						sb.append(Integer.toHexString((resultByte[i] & 0xFF) | 0x100).substring(1, 3));
					}
					result = sb.toString();
			}
		}
		return result;
	}
}</script>\r
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>\r
      </ws:createOrUpdate>\r
   </soapenv:Body>\r
</soapenv:Envelope>

import java.util.List;

con:request.name: Create Mediation_Flow script
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r
   <soapenv:Header/>\r
   <soapenv:Body>\r
      <ws:createOrUpdate>\r
         <createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.Mediation_${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_Flow" description="Mediation_Flow">\r
            <type>JAVA</type>\r
            <script><![CDATA[package org.meveo.service.script;

import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.admin.parse.csv.CDR;
import org.meveo.model.crm.Provider;
import org.meveo.model.mediation.Access;
import org.meveo.service.script.ScriptInterface;
import org.meveo.service.script.ScriptInstanceService;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

public class Mediation_${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_Flow extends org.meveo.service.script.Script {

	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(Mediation_${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_Flow.class);
	ScriptInstanceService scriptInstanceService = (ScriptInstanceService) getServiceInterface("ScriptInstanceService");

	Class<ScriptInterface> mediation_DuplicatedCheck;
	Class<ScriptInterface> mediation_RoutingSub;
	Class<ScriptInterface> mediation_CreateEdr;

	@Override
	public void init(Map<String,Object> methodContext) throws BusinessException {
		mediation_DuplicatedCheck = scriptInstanceService.getScriptInterface("org.meveo.service.script.Mediation_${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_DuplicatedCheck");
		mediation_RoutingSub = scriptInstanceService.getScriptInterface("org.meveo.service.script.Mediation_${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_RoutingSub");
		mediation_CreateEdr = scriptInstanceService.getScriptInterface("org.meveo.service.script.Mediation_${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_CreateEdr");
	}

	@Override
	public void execute(Map<String, Object> initContext) throws BusinessException {
		log.info("Execute...");

		CDR cdr = (CDR) initContext.get("record");

		try {
			mediation_DuplicatedCheck.newInstance().execute(initContext);
		} catch (InstantiationException | IllegalAccessException e) {
			throw new BusinessException("ErrTech");
		}
		Boolean duplicateFound = (Boolean) initContext.get("duplicateFound");
		log.info("duplicateFound:" + duplicateFound);

		if (duplicateFound != null && duplicateFound.booleanValue()) {
			throw new BusinessException("DuplicateFound");
		}
		initContext.put("accessUserId", cdr.getAccess_id());
		try {
			mediation_RoutingSub.newInstance().execute(initContext);
		} catch (InstantiationException | IllegalAccessException e) {
			throw new BusinessException("ErrTech");
		}

		List<Access> accesses = (List<Access>) initContext.get("accesses");
		if (accesses == null || accesses.isEmpty()) {
			throw new BusinessException("InvalidAccess");
		}
		try {
			mediation_CreateEdr.newInstance().execute(initContext);
		} catch (InstantiationException | IllegalAccessException e) {
			throw new BusinessException("ErrTech");
		}

		log.info("Execute update entity OK");
	}

}]]></script>\r
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>\r
      </ws:createOrUpdate>\r
   </soapenv:Body>\r
</soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create CreateFileFromContent script
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r
   <soapenv:Header/>\r
   <soapenv:Body>\r
      <ws:createOrUpdate>\r
         <createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.${#TestSuite#baseEntityPrefix}_CreateFile" description="Create File from context String">\r
            <type>JAVA</type>\r
            <script>package org.meveo.service.script;

import java.io.File;
import java.io.FileOutputStream;
import java.io.OutputStreamWriter;
import java.util.Map;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.commons.utils.ParamBean;
import org.meveo.model.crm.Provider;
import org.meveo.service.crm.impl.ProviderService;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;


public class ${#TestSuite#baseEntityPrefix}_CreateFile extends Script {

	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(${#TestSuite#baseEntityPrefix}_CreateFile.class);

	@Override
	public void execute(Map<String, Object> methodContext) throws BusinessException {
		String directory = (String) methodContext.get("directory");
		if(directory==null){
			directory="";
		} else {
			directory=directory.replaceAll("\\.\\.", "").replaceAll("~","");
		}
		String fileName = (String) methodContext.get("fileName");
		if(fileName==null){
			throw new BusinessException("fileName is missing");
		}
		String content = (String) methodContext.get("content");
		String charsetName = (String) methodContext.get("charsetName");
		if(charsetName==null){
			charsetName="UTF-8";
		}
		ParamBean parambean = ParamBean.getInstance();
		Provider appProvider = ((ProviderService)getServiceInterface("ProviderService")).getProvider();
		String rootDir = parambean.getProperty("providers.rootDir", "./opencelldata") + File.separator + appProvider.getCode() + File.separator;
		String outputDir = rootDir+directory;
		File f = new File(outputDir);
		if (!f.exists()) {
			log.debug("create directory "+outputDir);
			f.mkdirs();
		}

		File outputFile = new File(outputDir+File.separator+fileName);
		try(OutputStreamWriter out = new OutputStreamWriter(new FileOutputStream(outputFile), charsetName)){
			out.write(content);
			log.debug("wrote {} characters in the file {}",content.length(),fileName);
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
			throw new BusinessException("error while writing file content",e);
		}
	}
}</script>\r
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>\r
      </ws:createOrUpdate>\r
   </soapenv:Body>\r
</soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create Mediation_TopTen_EDR
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r
   <soapenv:Header/>\r
   <soapenv:Body>\r
      <ws:createOrUpdate>\r
         <createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.Mediation_${#TestSuite#entityPrefix}_EDR" description="Mediation TopTen">\r
            <type>JAVA</type>\r
            <script><![CDATA[package org.meveo.service.script;

import java.math.RoundingMode;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.admin.parse.csv.CDR;
import org.meveo.model.BaseEntity;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.meveo.model.billing.Subscription;
import org.meveo.model.crm.Provider;
import org.meveo.model.mediation.Access;
import org.meveo.model.rating.EDR;
import org.meveo.model.rating.EDRStatusEnum;
import org.meveo.service.billing.impl.EdrService;
import org.meveo.service.billing.impl.SubscriptionService;
import org.meveo.service.crm.impl.CustomFieldInstanceService;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

public class Mediation_${#TestSuite#entityPrefix}_EDR extends Script {

	private static final String TOPTEN_CF = "${#TestSuite#entityPrefix}";
	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(Mediation_${#TestSuite#entityPrefix}_EDR.class);

	EdrService edrService = (EdrService) getServiceInterface("EdrService");
	SubscriptionService subService = (SubscriptionService) getServiceInterface("SubscriptionService");
     CustomFieldInstanceService cfService = (CustomFieldInstanceService) getServiceInterface("CustomFieldInstanceService");

	@Override
	public void execute(Map<String, Object> initContext) throws BusinessException {
		log.debug("Execute...");
		CDR cdr = (CDR) initContext.get("record");
		String originBatch = (String) initContext.get("originBatch");
		String originRecord = (String) initContext.get("originRecord");

		@SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
		List<Access> accesses = (List<Access>) initContext.get("accesses");

		for (Access accessPoint : accesses) {
			if ((accessPoint.getStartDate() == null || accessPoint.getStartDate().getTime() <= cdr.getTimestamp().getTime()) && (accessPoint.getEndDate() == null || accessPoint.getEndDate().getTime() > cdr.getTimestamp().getTime())) {
				EDR edr = new EDR();
				edr.setCreated(new Date());
				edr.setEventDate(cdr.getTimestamp());
				edr.setOriginBatch(originBatch);
				edr.setOriginRecord(originRecord);
				edr.setParameter1(cdr.getParam1());
				edr.setParameter2(cdr.getParam2());
				edr.setParameter3(cdr.getParam3());
				edr.setParameter4(cdr.getParam4());
				edr.setParameter5(cdr.getParam5());
				edr.setParameter6(cdr.getParam6());
				edr.setParameter7(cdr.getParam7());
				edr.setParameter8(cdr.getParam8());
				edr.setParameter9(cdr.getParam9());
				edr.setDateParam1(cdr.getDateParam1());
				edr.setDateParam2(cdr.getDateParam2());
				edr.setDateParam3(cdr.getDateParam3());
				edr.setDateParam4(cdr.getDateParam4());
				edr.setDateParam5(cdr.getDateParam5());
				edr.setDecimalParam1(cdr.getDecimalParam1() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam1().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setDecimalParam2(cdr.getDecimalParam2() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam2().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setDecimalParam3(cdr.getDecimalParam3() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam3().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setDecimalParam4(cdr.getDecimalParam4() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam4().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setDecimalParam5(cdr.getDecimalParam5() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam5().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setAccessCode(accessPoint.getAccessUserId());
				edr.setQuantity(cdr.getQuantity());
				edr.setStatus(EDRStatusEnum.OPEN);
				edr.setSubscription(accessPoint.getSubscription());
				if("VOICE".equals(cdr.getParam1())){
				     Subscription sub = subService.findById(accessPoint.getSubscription().getId());
					List<Object> topTenNumbers = (List)cfService.getCFValue(sub, TOPTEN_CF, cdr.getTimestamp());
					if(topTenNumbers==null){
						topTenNumbers = new ArrayList<Object>();
					}
					if(topTenNumbers.size()<10 || topTenNumbers.contains(cdr.getParam2())){
						edr.setParameter3("TOPTEN");
						if(topTenNumbers.size()<10  && !topTenNumbers.contains(cdr.getParam2())){
							topTenNumbers.add(cdr.getParam2());
							cfService.setCFValue(sub, TOPTEN_CF, topTenNumbers, cdr.getTimestamp());
						}
					}
				}
				edrService.create(edr);
			}
			log.info("Created EDR OK");
		}
	}

}]]></script>\r
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>\r
      </ws:createOrUpdate>\r
   </soapenv:Body>\r
</soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create Mediation_TopTen_Flow
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r
   <soapenv:Header/>\r
   <soapenv:Body>\r
      <ws:createOrUpdate>\r
         <createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.Mediation_${#TestSuite#entityPrefix}_Flow" description="Mediation TopTen Flow">\r
            <type>JAVA</type>\r
            <script><![CDATA[package org.meveo.service.script;

import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.List;
import java.text.ParseException;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Map;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.admin.parse.csv.CDR;
import org.meveo.model.crm.Provider;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.meveo.model.mediation.Access;
import org.meveo.model.notification.InboundRequest;

public class Mediation_${#TestSuite#entityPrefix}_Flow extends Script {

	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(Mediation_${#TestSuite#entityPrefix}_Flow.class);
	ScriptInstanceService javaCompilerManager = (ScriptInstanceService) getServiceInterface("ScriptInstanceService");

	Class<ScriptInterface> mediation_DuplicatedCheck;
	Class<ScriptInterface> mediation_RoutingSub;
	Class<ScriptInterface> mediation_CreateEdr;

	SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss");

	@Override
	public void init(Map<String, Object> initContext) throws BusinessException {
		mediation_DuplicatedCheck = javaCompilerManager.getScriptInterface("org.meveo.service.script.Mediation_${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_DuplicatedCheck");
		mediation_RoutingSub = javaCompilerManager.getScriptInterface("org.meveo.service.script.Mediation_${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_RoutingSub");
		mediation_CreateEdr = javaCompilerManager.getScriptInterface("org.meveo.service.script.Mediation_${#TestSuite#entityPrefix}_EDR");
	}

	@Override
	public void execute(Map<String, Object> initContext) throws BusinessException {
		log.info("Execute...");
		CDR cdr = new CDR();
		cdr.setAccess_id((String)initContext.get("accessId"));
		cdr.setParam1((String)initContext.get("param1"));
		cdr.setParam2((String)initContext.get("param2"));
		cdr.setQuantity(new BigDecimal((String)initContext.get("quantity")));
		try{
		cdr.setTimestamp(sdf.parse((String)initContext.get("time")));
		} catch(Exception e){
		  throw new BusinessException("date parsing error",e);
		}
		initContext.put("record", cdr);
		try {
               mediation_DuplicatedCheck.newInstance().execute(initContext);
			Boolean duplicateFound = (Boolean)initContext.get("duplicateFound");
			log.info("duplicateFound:"+duplicateFound);

			if(duplicateFound != null && duplicateFound.booleanValue()){
				throw new BusinessException("DuplicateFound");
			}
			initContext.put("accessUserId",cdr.getAccess_id());
			mediation_RoutingSub.newInstance().execute(initContext);

			@SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
			List<Access> accesses = (List<Access>) initContext.get("accesses");
			if(accesses == null || accesses.isEmpty()){
				throw new BusinessException("InvalidAccess");
			}

			mediation_CreateEdr.newInstance().execute(initContext);

		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
			throw new BusinessException("ErrTech",e);
		}
		log.info("Execute update entity OK");
	}

}]]></script>\r
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>\r
      </ws:createOrUpdate>\r
   </soapenv:Body>\r
</soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create Mediation_TopTen_File_Flow script
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r
   <soapenv:Header/>\r
   <soapenv:Body>\r
      <ws:createOrUpdate>\r
         <createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.Mediation_${#TestSuite#entityPrefix}_Flow" description="Mediation TopTen Flow from a file">\r
            <type>JAVA</type>\r
            <script><![CDATA[package org.meveo.service.script;

import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.List;
import java.text.ParseException;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Map;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.admin.parse.csv.CDR;
import org.meveo.model.crm.Provider;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.meveo.model.mediation.Access;
import org.meveo.model.notification.InboundRequest;

public class Mediation_${#TestSuite#entityPrefix}_Flow extends Script {

	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(Mediation_${#TestSuite#entityPrefix}_Flow.class);
	ScriptInstanceService javaCompilerManager = (ScriptInstanceService) getServiceInterface("ScriptInstanceService");

	Class<ScriptInterface> mediation_DuplicatedCheck;
	Class<ScriptInterface> mediation_RoutingSub;
	Class<ScriptInterface> mediation_CreateEdr;

	SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss");

	@Override
	public void init(Map<String,Object> methodContext)throws BusinessException {
		mediation_DuplicatedCheck = javaCompilerManager.getScriptInterface("org.meveo.service.script.Mediation_${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_DuplicatedCheck");
		mediation_RoutingSub = javaCompilerManager.getScriptInterface("org.meveo.service.script.Mediation_${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_RoutingSub");
		mediation_CreateEdr = javaCompilerManager.getScriptInterface("org.meveo.service.script.Mediation_${#TestSuite#entityPrefix}_EDR");
	}

	@Override
	public void execute(Map<String, Object> initContext)throws BusinessException {
		log.info("Execute...");
		CDR cdr = null;
		if(initContext.get("record")!=null){
			cdr = (CDR)initContext.get("record");
		} else {
			cdr = new CDR();
			cdr.setAccess_id((String)initContext.get("accessId"));
			cdr.setParam1((String)initContext.get("param1"));
			cdr.setParam2((String)initContext.get("param2"));
			cdr.setQuantity(new BigDecimal((String)initContext.get("quantity")));
			try{
			cdr.setTimestamp(sdf.parse((String)initContext.get("time")));
			} catch(Exception e){
			  throw new BusinessException("date parsing error",e);
			}
			initContext.put("record", cdr);
		}
		try {
               mediation_DuplicatedCheck.newInstance().execute(initContext);
			Boolean duplicateFound = (Boolean)initContext.get("duplicateFound");
			log.info("duplicateFound:"+duplicateFound);

			if(duplicateFound != null && duplicateFound.booleanValue()){
				throw new BusinessException("DuplicateFound");
			}
			initContext.put("accessUserId",cdr.getAccess_id());
			mediation_RoutingSub.newInstance().execute(initContext);

			@SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
			List<Access> accesses = (List<Access>) initContext.get("accesses");
			if(accesses == null || accesses.isEmpty()){
				throw new BusinessException("InvalidAccess");
			}

			mediation_CreateEdr.newInstance().execute(initContext);

		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
			throw new BusinessException("ErrTech",e);
		}
		log.info("Execute update entity OK");
	}

}]]></script>\r
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>\r
      </ws:createOrUpdate>\r
   </soapenv:Body>\r
</soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create Mediation_TopTen_File_EDR
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r
   <soapenv:Header/>\r
   <soapenv:Body>\r
      <ws:createOrUpdate>\r
         <createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.Mediation_${#TestSuite#entityPrefix}_EDR" description="Mediation TopTen">\r
            <type>JAVA</type>\r
            <script><![CDATA[package org.meveo.service.script;

import java.math.RoundingMode;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.admin.parse.csv.CDR;
import org.meveo.model.BaseEntity;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.meveo.model.billing.Subscription;
import org.meveo.model.crm.Provider;
import org.meveo.model.mediation.Access;
import org.meveo.model.rating.EDR;
import org.meveo.model.rating.EDRStatusEnum;
import org.meveo.service.billing.impl.EdrService;
import org.meveo.service.billing.impl.SubscriptionService;
import org.meveo.service.crm.impl.CustomFieldInstanceService;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

public class Mediation_${#TestSuite#entityPrefix}_EDR extends Script {

	private static final String TOPTEN_CF = "${#TestSuite#entityPrefix}";
	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(Mediation_${#TestSuite#entityPrefix}_EDR.class);

	EdrService edrService = (EdrService) getServiceInterface("EdrService");
	SubscriptionService subService = (SubscriptionService) getServiceInterface("SubscriptionService");
     CustomFieldInstanceService cfService = (CustomFieldInstanceService) getServiceInterface("CustomFieldInstanceService");

	@Override
	public void execute(Map<String, Object> initContext) throws BusinessException {
		log.debug("Execute...");
		CDR cdr = (CDR) initContext.get("record");
		String originBatch = (String) initContext.get("originBatch");
		String originRecord = (String) initContext.get("originRecord");

		@SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
		List<Access> accesses = (List<Access>) initContext.get("accesses");

		for (Access accessPoint : accesses) {
			if ((accessPoint.getStartDate() == null || accessPoint.getStartDate().getTime() <= cdr.getTimestamp().getTime()) && (accessPoint.getEndDate() == null || accessPoint.getEndDate().getTime() > cdr.getTimestamp().getTime())) {
				EDR edr = new EDR();
				edr.setCreated(new Date());
				edr.setEventDate(cdr.getTimestamp());
				edr.setOriginBatch(originBatch);
				edr.setOriginRecord(originRecord);
				edr.setParameter1(cdr.getParam1());
				edr.setParameter2(cdr.getParam2());
				edr.setParameter3(cdr.getParam3());
				edr.setParameter4(cdr.getParam4());
				edr.setParameter5(cdr.getParam5());
				edr.setParameter6(cdr.getParam6());
				edr.setParameter7(cdr.getParam7());
				edr.setParameter8(cdr.getParam8());
				edr.setParameter9(cdr.getParam9());
				edr.setDateParam1(cdr.getDateParam1());
				edr.setDateParam2(cdr.getDateParam2());
				edr.setDateParam3(cdr.getDateParam3());
				edr.setDateParam4(cdr.getDateParam4());
				edr.setDateParam5(cdr.getDateParam5());
				edr.setDecimalParam1(cdr.getDecimalParam1() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam1().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setDecimalParam2(cdr.getDecimalParam2() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam2().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setDecimalParam3(cdr.getDecimalParam3() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam3().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setDecimalParam4(cdr.getDecimalParam4() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam4().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setDecimalParam5(cdr.getDecimalParam5() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam5().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setAccessCode(accessPoint.getAccessUserId());
				edr.setQuantity(cdr.getQuantity());
				edr.setStatus(EDRStatusEnum.OPEN);
				edr.setSubscription(accessPoint.getSubscription());
				if("VOICE".equals(cdr.getParam1())){
				     Subscription sub = subService.findById(accessPoint.getSubscription().getId());
					List<Object> topTenNumbers = (List)cfService.getCFValue(sub, TOPTEN_CF, cdr.getTimestamp());
					if(topTenNumbers==null){
						topTenNumbers = new ArrayList<Object>();
					}
					if(topTenNumbers.size()<10 || topTenNumbers.contains(cdr.getParam2())){
						edr.setParameter3("TOPTEN");
						if(topTenNumbers.size()<10  && !topTenNumbers.contains(cdr.getParam2())){
							topTenNumbers.add(cdr.getParam2());
							cfService.setCFValue(sub, TOPTEN_CF, topTenNumbers, cdr.getTimestamp());
						}
					}
				}
				edrService.create(edr);
			}
			log.info("Created EDR OK");
		}
	}

}]]></script>\r
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>\r
      </ws:createOrUpdate>\r
   </soapenv:Body>\r
</soapenv:Envelope>

            <type>JAVA</type>\r
            <script><![CDATA[package org.meveo.service.script;

		String originRecord = (String) initContext.get("originRecord");

		@SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
		List<Access> accesses = (List<Access>) initContext.get("accesses");

		for (Access accessPoint : accesses) {
			if ((accessPoint.getStartDate() == null || accessPoint.getStartDate().getTime() <= cdr.getTimestamp().getTime()) && (accessPoint.getEndDate() == null || accessPoint.getEndDate().getTime() > cdr.getTimestamp().getTime())) {
				EDR edr = new EDR();
				edr.setCreated(new Date());
				edr.setEventDate(cdr.getTimestamp());
				edr.setOriginBatch(originBatch);
				edr.setOriginRecord(originRecord);
				edr.setParameter1(cdr.getParam1());
				edr.setParameter2(cdr.getParam2());
				edr.setParameter3(cdr.getParam3());
				edr.setParameter4(cdr.getParam4());
				edr.setParameter5(cdr.getParam5());
				edr.setParameter6(cdr.getParam6());

				edr.setDateParam3(cdr.getDateParam3());
				edr.setDateParam4(cdr.getDateParam4());
				edr.setDateParam5(cdr.getDateParam5());
				edr.setDecimalParam1(cdr.getDecimalParam1() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam1().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setDecimalParam2(cdr.getDecimalParam2() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam2().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setDecimalParam3(cdr.getDecimalParam3() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam3().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setDecimalParam4(cdr.getDecimalParam4() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam4().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setDecimalParam5(cdr.getDecimalParam5() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam5().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setAccessCode(accessPoint.getAccessUserId());
				edr.setQuantity(cdr.getQuantity());
				edr.setStatus(EDRStatusEnum.OPEN);
				edr.setSubscription(accessPoint.getSubscription());
				if("VOICE".equals(cdr.getParam1())){
				    Subscription sub = subService.findById(accessPoint.getSubscription().getId());
				    Customer cust= sub.getUserAccount().getBillingAccount().getCustomerAccount().getCustomer();
					String zoningCode = (String)cfService.getCFValueByClosestMatch(cust, CF_NAME,cdr.getTimestamp(), accessPoint.getAccessUserId());
					if(zoningCode==null){
					     zoningCode="NOT_FOUND";
					}
					edr.setParameter2(zoningCode);
					zoningCode = (String)cfService.getCFValueByClosestMatch(cust, CF_NAME,cdr.getTimestamp(), cdr.getParam2());
					if(zoningCode==null){
					     zoningCode="NOT_FOUND";
					}
					edr.setParameter3(zoningCode);
				}
				edrService.create(edr);
			}
			log.info("Created EDR OK");
		}
	}
}]]></script>\r
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>\r
      </ws:createOrUpdate>\r
   </soapenv:Body>\r
</soapenv:Envelope>

            <type>JAVA</type>\r
            <script><![CDATA[package org.meveo.service.script;

import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.List;
import java.text.ParseException;
import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
import java.util.Map;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.admin.parse.csv.CDR;
import org.meveo.model.crm.Provider;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.meveo.model.mediation.Access;
import org.meveo.model.notification.InboundRequest;

public class Mediation_${#TestSuite#entityPrefix}_Flow extends Script {

	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(Mediation_${#TestSuite#entityPrefix}_Flow.class);
	ScriptInstanceService javaCompilerManager = (ScriptInstanceService) getServiceInterface("ScriptInstanceService");

	Class<ScriptInterface> mediation_DuplicatedCheck;
	Class<ScriptInterface> mediation_RoutingSub;
	Class<ScriptInterface> mediation_CreateEdr;

	SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss");

	@Override
	public void init(Map<String,Object> initContext)throws BusinessException {
		mediation_DuplicatedCheck = javaCompilerManager.getScriptInterface("org.meveo.service.script.Mediation_${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_DuplicatedCheck");
		mediation_RoutingSub = javaCompilerManager.getScriptInterface("org.meveo.service.script.Mediation_${#Project#baseEntityPrefix}_RoutingSub");
		mediation_CreateEdr = javaCompilerManager.getScriptInterface("org.meveo.service.script.Mediation_${#TestSuite#entityPrefix}_EDR");
	}

	@Override
	public void execute(Map<String, Object> initContext)throws BusinessException {
		log.info("Execute...");
		CDR cdr = new CDR();
		cdr.setAccess_id((String)initContext.get("accessId"));
		cdr.setParam1((String)initContext.get("param1"));
		cdr.setParam2((String)initContext.get("param2"));
		cdr.setQuantity(new BigDecimal((String)initContext.get("quantity")));
		try{
		cdr.setTimestamp(sdf.parse((String)initContext.get("time")));
		} catch(Exception e){
		  throw new BusinessException("date parsing error",e);
		}
		initContext.put("record", cdr);
		try {
               mediation_DuplicatedCheck.newInstance().execute(initContext);
			Boolean duplicateFound = (Boolean)initContext.get("duplicateFound");
			log.info("duplicateFound:"+duplicateFound);

			if(duplicateFound != null && duplicateFound.booleanValue()){
				throw new BusinessException("DuplicateFound");
			}
			initContext.put("accessUserId",cdr.getAccess_id());
			mediation_RoutingSub.newInstance().execute(initContext);

			@SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
			List<Access> accesses = (List<Access>) initContext.get("accesses");
			if(accesses == null || accesses.isEmpty()){
				throw new BusinessException("InvalidAccess");
			}

			mediation_CreateEdr.newInstance().execute(initContext);

		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
			throw new BusinessException("ErrTech",e);
		}
		log.info("Execute update entity OK");
	}

}]]></script>\r
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>\r
      </ws:createOrUpdate>\r
   </soapenv:Body>\r
</soapenv:Envelope>

   <soapenv:Header/>\r
   <soapenv:Body>\r
      <ws:createOrUpdate>\r
         <createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.Mediation_${#TestSuite#entityPrefix}_EDR" description="Mediation TopTen">\r
            <type>JAVA</type>\r
            <script><![CDATA[package org.meveo.service.script;

import java.math.RoundingMode;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.List;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.admin.parse.csv.CDR;
import org.meveo.model.BaseEntity;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.meveo.model.billing.Subscription;
import org.meveo.model.crm.Customer;
import org.meveo.model.crm.Provider;
import org.meveo.model.mediation.Access;
import org.meveo.model.rating.EDR;
import org.meveo.model.rating.EDRStatusEnum;
import org.meveo.service.billing.impl.EdrService;
import org.meveo.service.billing.impl.SubscriptionService;
import org.meveo.service.crm.impl.CustomFieldInstanceService;
import org.meveo.cache.CustomFieldsCacheContainerProvider;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

public class Mediation_${#TestSuite#entityPrefix}_EDR extends Script {

	private static final String CF_NAME = "${#TestSuite#entityPrefix}";
	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(Mediation_${#TestSuite#entityPrefix}_EDR.class);

	EdrService edrService = (EdrService) getServiceInterface("EdrService");
	SubscriptionService subService = (SubscriptionService) getServiceInterface("SubscriptionService");
     CustomFieldInstanceService cfService = (CustomFieldInstanceService) getServiceInterface("CustomFieldInstanceService");
     CustomFieldsCacheContainerProvider cfccProvider = (CustomFieldsCacheContainerProvider) getServiceInterface("CustomFieldsCacheContainerProvider");

	@Override
	public void execute(Map<String, Object> initContext) throws BusinessException {
		log.debug("Execute...");
		CDR cdr = (CDR) initContext.get("record");
		String originBatch = (String) initContext.get("originBatch");
		String originRecord = (String) initContext.get("originRecord");

		@SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
		List<Access> accesses = (List<Access>) initContext.get("accesses");

		for (Access accessPoint : accesses) {
			if ((accessPoint.getStartDate() == null || accessPoint.getStartDate().getTime() <= cdr.getTimestamp().getTime()) && (accessPoint.getEndDate() == null || accessPoint.getEndDate().getTime() > cdr.getTimestamp().getTime())) {
				EDR edr = new EDR();
				edr.setCreated(new Date());
				edr.setEventDate(cdr.getTimestamp());
				edr.setOriginBatch(originBatch);
				edr.setOriginRecord(originRecord);
				edr.setParameter1(cdr.getParam1());
				edr.setParameter2(cdr.getParam2());
				edr.setParameter3(cdr.getParam3());
				edr.setParameter4(cdr.getParam4());
				edr.setParameter5(cdr.getParam5());
				edr.setParameter6(cdr.getParam6());
				edr.setParameter7(cdr.getParam7());
				edr.setParameter8(cdr.getParam8());
				edr.setParameter9(cdr.getParam9());
				edr.setDateParam1(cdr.getDateParam1());
				edr.setDateParam2(cdr.getDateParam2());
				edr.setDateParam3(cdr.getDateParam3());
				edr.setDateParam4(cdr.getDateParam4());
				edr.setDateParam5(cdr.getDateParam5());
				edr.setDecimalParam1(cdr.getDecimalParam1() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam1().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setDecimalParam2(cdr.getDecimalParam2() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam2().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setDecimalParam3(cdr.getDecimalParam3() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam3().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setDecimalParam4(cdr.getDecimalParam4() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam4().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setDecimalParam5(cdr.getDecimalParam5() != null ? cdr.getDecimalParam5().setScale(BaseEntity.NB_DECIMALS, RoundingMode.HALF_UP) : null);
				edr.setAccessCode(accessPoint.getAccessUserId());
				edr.setQuantity(cdr.getQuantity());
				edr.setStatus(EDRStatusEnum.OPEN);
				edr.setSubscription(accessPoint.getSubscription());
				if("VOICE".equals(cdr.getParam1())){
				    Subscription sub = subService.findById(accessPoint.getSubscription().getId());
				    Customer cust= sub.getUserAccount().getBillingAccount().getCustomerAccount().getCustomer();
				    //increment CF value
				    edr.setStatus(EDRStatusEnum.MEDIATING);
				}
				edrService.create(edr);
			}
			log.info("Created EDR OK");
		}
	}
}]]></script>\r
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>\r
      </ws:createOrUpdate>\r
   </soapenv:Body>\r
</soapenv:Envelope>
